trans-unit.source: Learn how send email with the SendGrid email service on Azure.
trans-unit.target: Learn how send email with the SendGrid email service on Azure.

trans-unit.source: This guide demonstrates how to perform common programming tasks with the
trans-unit.target: This guide demonstrates how to perform common programming tasks with the

trans-unit.source: SendGrid email service on Azure.
trans-unit.target: SendGrid email service on Azure.

trans-unit.source: The samples are written in
trans-unit.target: The samples are written in

trans-unit.source: Java.
trans-unit.target: Java.

trans-unit.source: The scenarios covered include **constructing email**, **sending email**, **adding attachments**, **using filters**, and **updating properties**.
trans-unit.target: The scenarios covered include **constructing email**, **sending email**, **adding attachments**, **using filters**, and **updating properties**.

trans-unit.source: For more information on SendGrid and sending email, see
trans-unit.target: For more information on SendGrid and sending email, see

trans-unit.target: the [Next steps](#next-steps) section.

trans-unit.source: What is the SendGrid Email Service?
trans-unit.target: What is the SendGrid Email Service?

trans-unit.source: SendGrid is a [cloud-based email service] that provides reliable
trans-unit.target: SendGrid is a [cloud-based email service] that provides reliable

trans-unit.source: [transactional email delivery], scalability, and real-time analytics along with flexible APIs
trans-unit.target: [transactional email delivery], scalability, and real-time analytics along with flexible APIs

trans-unit.source: that make custom integration easy.
trans-unit.target: that make custom integration easy.

trans-unit.source: How to: Use filters to enable footers, tracking, and analytics
trans-unit.target: How to: Use filters to enable footers, tracking, and analytics

trans-unit.source: SendGrid provides additional email functionality through the use of
trans-unit.target: SendGrid provides additional email functionality through the use of

trans-unit.source: *filters*.
trans-unit.target: *filters*.

trans-unit.source: These are settings that can be added to an email message to
trans-unit.target: These are settings that can be added to an email message to

trans-unit.source: enable specific functionality such as enabling click tracking, Google
trans-unit.target: enable specific functionality such as enabling click tracking, Google

trans-unit.source: analytics, subscription tracking, and so on.
trans-unit.target: analytics, subscription tracking, and so on.

trans-unit.source: For a full list of filters,
trans-unit.target: For a full list of filters,

trans-unit.source: see [Filter Settings][].
trans-unit.target: see [Filter Settings][].

trans-unit.source: The following shows how to insert a footer filter that results in
trans-unit.target: The following shows how to insert a footer filter that results in

trans-unit.source: HTML text appearing at the bottom of the email being sent.
trans-unit.target: HTML text appearing at the bottom of the email being sent.

trans-unit.source: Another example of a filter is click tracking.
trans-unit.target: Another example of a filter is click tracking.
